content:
Do the same for this as it relates to FHA report sketch requirements: • The appraiser is not required to sketch the distances between the well and septic, however, he or she should be mindful of FHA's minimum distance requirements between private wells and sources of pollution (septic systems). Please comment on the distances, if discernible. Otherwise, comment that the distances were not discernable.
• Sketches to include dimensions of the home, patios, porches, garages, breezeways, outbuildings, basements and other offsets (pools). State “covered” or “uncovered” to indicate a roof or no roof (such as over a patio), and any other attachments or outbuildings.
